personalInfo.name: Alex Smith
personalInfo.careerObjective: Passionate Software Engineer with five years of experience in full-stack development, seeking an opportunity to contribute to innovative projects in a dynamic environment.

workExperience.workSummary: Led a cross-functional team of 5 in building scalable enterprise applications using React, Node.js, and AWS. Migrated legacy systems to a microservices architecture, reducing system downtime by 50% and improving deployment cycles using CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, Docker).

Developed interactive web interfaces with React.js and RESTful APIs with Node.js/Express. Integrated MongoDB and Redis for optimized backend performance. Participated in Agile ceremonies, performed code reviews, and mentored two junior developers.

Assisted in developing features for an internal HR system using Angular and PHP. Gained hands-on experience in Git version control and writing unit tests. Contributed to writing technical documentation and user manuals.
